metadata.title: CVE-2018-20177 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: rdesktop versions up to and including v1.8.3 contain an Integer Overflow that leads to a Heap-Based Buffer Overflow in the function rdp_in_unistr() and results in memory corruption and possibly even a remote code execution.

criterions.comment: rdesktop package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.4-1').
